name: Burgler King
description:
Burgler King is a 4 – player vs game where the objective is to steal as much valuable treasure as you can against your friends. Set various traps to sabotage your friends, avoid patrolling guards, and steal as much treasure as you can!

Action                 
Mouse & Keyboard
Controller     
MovementWASDLeft Stick
InteractEX
TrapXAPunchM1Right Bumper
